message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $150 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand that $150 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $135 for the product. What do you think?
Alice,  $135 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $125. This is my final offer. Let me know if you're interested.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $130 for the product. This is my final offer. Let me know if you're interested.
